issue.title: [C++] Hash table specializations for small integers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1942](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1942). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is no need to use a dynamically-sized hash table with uint8, int8, since a fixed-size lookup table can be used and avoid hashing altogether
